phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
H-Hagu-chan, what is this dish called?
I arranged mint chocolate ice cream on top of a microwaved pumpkin.
Guys do not like pumpkin as it is, and she is stuffing it with something even worse like mint chocolate!
D-Does not this make you feel like you are eating chocolate while brushing your teeth?
I wonder if Yamada-san and Hagu-chan always eat things like this...
You will make a great wife, Hagu-chan.
Oh no, you are embarrassing me, Ayu.
I need to give some to Shuu-chan, too.
Please eat a lot and do your best at work.
Namu: short for Namuamidabutsu (I sincerely believe in Amitabha).
Roughly equivalent to the Christian Amen.
You are acting like he is dead!
Hagu-chan, may I ask what those yellow bits that are mixed in with the rice are?
Please pour this boiled whole-apple curry on it and eat.
So you ate food like this all the time, Hanamoto-sensei?
And you have always eaten it obediently, have not you?
It is been four months already, has not it?
It is like a man's dream adventure.
I wonder if Shuu-chan is eating well...
What if he lost weight because he does not like the food over there?
No, I am sure he is eating fine.
He might have actually gained weight.
I am sure Sensei is doing his best, so you will have to work just as hard, Hagu-chan.
The school festival is coming up soon.
We need to send him pictures of your work.
It will never stand out if you do not make something large.
I still need to finish three more blueprints and two models.
You are becoming all lax because you have graduated!
And he is asking for seconds?!
Morita-san, you have the heart of a hero!
Hey, do seventh graders need to attend the school festival, too?
What is wrong with this man?
He is been crying for two weeks straight.
Hanamoto, I was an idiot for bringing you along.
By the way, why did we gather tonight?
It was not a party to show off our cooking skills?
Health-Sports Day: an official holiday in Japan (second Monday of October).
I am used to things like this already.
Well then, shall I reveal my special menu?
Though I do not have the ingredients...
I-I will go buy us a cake!
Why are you going into my room?!
It is a present for you!
And what in the world is this?
Oh yeah, there was something like that, was not there?
Was the game of Twister like this?
Only the convenience store was open!
But it will be a whole cake if we connect all of them!
And here are some candles... these were all I could find.
I think two people play by placing their hands and feet on the colors that are called out in turns.
How do you decide the colors?
I made these and figured we could just draw cards to decide.
Morita-san, are not there a little too many colors?
I think there is usually just red, blue, yellow, and green.
I figured the more colors, the better.
Note: The thing on the moon is two rabbits making rice cakes.
Japanese people think that is what the dark spots on the moon look like.
In fact, I am pretty depressed.
Hurry up and tell us the next color!
Yamada, please hurry and save Takemoto!
A-At this rate, it is going to turn into a penalty game instead of a present!
Having this as your memory of your birthday during your third year of college is too sorrowful!
Are not these party games supposed to be played between guys and girls?
Why are not you two playing with the birthday boy?
Senpai, that is a nice idea!
Well, we are both wearing skirts.
I would not want my underwear showing.
I could not help you out.
Hey, Ayu, let us put together a jigsaw puzzle.
Let us use the table over there.
You two change your minds too quickly!
Takemoto-kun and I are trying so hard!
Are you two demons abandoning us like that?!
Mayama-san, tell us the colors already!
Hurry up and give him the finishing blow!
Hold on, I will end your pain soon!
What kind of color is that, anyway?!
Hey, Ayu, how does this game end?
Mayama, how do you end it?
You lose when you cannot reach your next color, give up, or lose your balance and fall down!
You lose when you cannot reach your next color, give up
The color of their eyes has changed!
W-What are we supposed to do?
Oh, I am not drinking any more.
I came on my motor bike.
You ride that thing to work these days, do not you?
But is not riding all the way to Meguro with a 50cc engine a little tough?
No, it is actually really comfortable.
I do not even feel like taking trains anymore.
Your stalking is also a lot easier with a bike, is not it?
Do not talk about something that does not exist like you have seen it!
Knowing you, I do not need to see it to know.
I am going home since I have to go to work early tomorrow!
Please take care of the rest.
I am sure that once Takemoto wakes up, he will carry Morita-san back with him.
I wonder how you are supposed to give up...
Do I just decide to give up and act accordingly?
And move further and further away from what my heart really wants?
Then will I forget everything someday?
The scent of his brown hair, his cold ear, the warmth of his back...
Everything, including this pain in my heart?
Without a trace... as if nothing was there to begin with?
That Morita-san... I need to teach him a lesson once!
All I do is pass by her place every day on the way back from work, take a break, drink canned cofffee, and wonder if she is doing well.
It is not like I am ringing her doorbell.
All I do is look up at her room from outside.
Although they say that a girl becomes more beautiful when she falls in love...
It is no good for a guy.
Looks like she is still working.
Quietly singing a nostalgic song after brewing coffee...
Ah, she is too far away.
Its boldness, detail, and above all, its huge size!
To think that I would be able to see the birth of two legends at this age!
With Yamada-kun's graduate thesis and this large bowl...
To begin with, I am not an undergraduate here anymore.
You cannot use a graduate student's work as the main exhibit.
Damn it, what is it at an important time like this?
If it is not Yamada-kun's mother!
Your father, mother, and brother all have 39 C fevers and cannot get out of bed?
We are extremely sorry to say this, but we will be closed today.
So I am going home for a bit.
If you are lonely, why do not you ask the landlady to have Midori-chan come spend the night?
Ayu, say hello to your papa and mama for me!
I will be back tomorrow or the day after!
Please make sure to eat dinner!
And make sure to lock the patio door!
And make sure Midori-chan spends the night!
Yamada-san, you sound like a mother.
It is only for one night.
She might not look like that, but Hagu-chan is 19 years old.
I mean, one time my hamster died when I left it for just two days!
My mother was there at her deathbed, but I could not see her before she passed away!
Um... Yamada-san... is it really okay to put those two in the same category?
I mean, I am really worried.
After all, at night she calls out for Sensei and cries in her sleep.
Hagu-chan seemed to be in high spirits, but her small, muddy hands were trembling a little.
I wonder how important Hanamoto-sensei is to Hagu-chan...
Now that I think about it, Hagu-chan is always with Sensei, whether she is at school or at home.
Is not tonight her first real night alone since she came to Tokyo?
I had no idea what to do, and...
But there is no one for Hagu-chan right now.
Hold on, I will open the door.
Interpretation: Who the hell are you?
What am I doing, coming over to a girl's place at night all of a sudden?
If you try anything funny, I will fucking kill you.
Takemoto-kun, did you forget something here?
YOU-Um, I was passing by, and... so... um...
Want to put together a jigsaw puzzle?
And please make me a Versailles kitchen set!
I figured it would be something like that.
If... If you do not mind...
N-N-N-Next time Yamada-san and Sensei are not around...
She looks like she will break if I touch her even a little.
I know that, but something in my heart is struggling.
Will you please sleep in your own room?
I need to wake up early tomorrow, damn it!
I rub my heavy eyelids to reveal
A future in the shape of pastels
As my expressions were pulled in closer
Say, what was it that we were looking for again?
That is right, exactly when were those days
bokura ga inryoku ni sakarai nagara deatta koro
When we used to meet, denying the attraction that was forming between us?
sore ga waltz no you dane fushigi sa
It is like a waltz, is not it?
sasayaku youna komorebi no kousaten de
futari waltz no youni ne mawari nagara
Where the whispering sunlight falls through the trees and meet.
Next episode: That broach was heavy.
